sentences.sentence: Except the fashion-forward hoppers among you, who will of course be looking to tighten the ligature around your upper arms while gazing at the packaging for the as-yet unreleased Jacob Smack.
sentences.translation: 除去你周围那些时尚前卫的嘻哈人士，你希望谁在凝视给至今未释放的雅各布·斯曼克的包裹时收紧缠住你上臂的带子呢？

sentences.sentence: Objective: to provide anatomy data for endoscopic transnasal ligature of the sphenopalatine artery.
sentences.translation: 目的：为鼻内镜下经鼻蝶腭动脉结扎术提供解剖学资料。

sentences.sentence: Objective: To approach clinical effect of laparoscopic interstitial tubal pregnancy therapy with loop ligature method.
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨腹腔镜下套扎法治疗输卵管间质部妊娠临床效果。
